trans-unit.source: Represents an exception that occurred when performing an operation on a WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 表示對 WebSocket 連線執行作業時所發生的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The native error code for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況的原生錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error from the WebSocketError enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 來自 WebSocketError 列舉的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤的描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The native error code for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況的原生錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the previous exception that led to the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 指出造成目前例外狀況的先前例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The native error code for the exception that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生之例外狀況的原生錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: A SerializationInfo object.
trans-unit.target: SerializationInfo 物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sets the SerializationInfo object with the file name and line number where the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 以發生這個例外狀況的檔案名稱和行號，設定 SerializationInfo 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a WebSocketError indicating the type of error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示所發生錯誤之類型的 WebSocketError。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketError" />。
